concept.title: Elements in LwDITA
concept.shortdesc: An introduction to the different tags and elements featured in LwDITA.

conbody.p:
According to the working draft of the Oasis article Lightweight DITA: An Introduction, there is a specific and strict set of elements that you can utilize within LwDITA. These are the only elements you can use.
